definition: for use by the emperor/imperial/(derog.) in the pay of the ruler
to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Or else chocolate may become the food of kings yet again.
sentences.chinese: 否则巧克力可能会再次成为国王的御用食品。

sentences.english: The yeoman warders manage it now.
sentences.chinese: 如今是御用侍从卫士在管理。

sentences.english: Emperor's horses at Mürzsteg, lower Austria.
sentences.chinese: 下奥地利慕尔斯泰格的御用马群。

sentences.english: Yu is the regular cinematographer of leading director Jia Zhang-ke.
sentences.chinese: 余力为是知名导演贾樟柯的御用摄影师。

definition: the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
family firm producing a special product/cottage industry
to treasure/to be very fond of
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
stand-in/substitute/body double/stuntman/scapegoat/fall guy/to stand in for sb else
it is rumored that .../it is reported that ...
